channel.title: etc on Neuroimaging Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in etc on Neuroimaging Cookbook

item.title: Automatically Generated Recipe
item.description: Explain briefly what the recipe does. Explain briefly how the recipe works. Provide a citation and link to documentation of any third party software. Provide the version of the software/package Use bullet points for your recipe's explanation. Try to explain everything briefly but clearly. To format code, add it between a pair of 3 ticks (`) 1 2 3 def function_name(args): # code return 0 1 function_name(val) # result
